attributes.action: Lower the elegibilty age to get a bus pass in England to 60 years old.
attributes.additional_details: This fact can be found by looking at the governments own website and looking up the details for getting a bus pass.
attributes.background: Why is it in the United Kingdom the only country where the age to get a bus pass is retirement age ( in my instance its 66) is England, every other country in the United Kingdom it is 60.  This I consider discrimination and unfair.
